languages.text: "В знак своего расположения я отдам тебе твоего боевого невольника. Он забрел в логово, пока я тебя кроил, и назвался твоим телохранителем".
"As a sign of my favour, I'll give you your slave fighter. They wandered into the den while I was healing you, and said they were your bodyguard."
languages.original_text: "В знак своего расположения я отдам тебе твоего боевого невольника. Он забрел в логово, пока я тебя кроил, и назвался твоим телохранителем".

traits.locale_text: "As a sign of my favour, I'll give you your slave fighter. They wandered into the den while I was healing you, and said they were your bodyguard."
traits.speaker: Anger

traits.locale_text: "As a sign of my favour, I'll give you your slave fighter. They wandered into the den while I was healing you, and said they were your bodyguard."
traits.speaker: Anger

traits.locale_text: "As a sign of my favour, I'll give you your slave fighter. They wandered into the den while I was healing you, and said they were your bodyguard."

traits.locale_text: "As a sign of my favour, I'll give you your slave fighter. They wandered into the den while I was healing you, and said they were your bodyguard."
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: “作为我的青睐，我会把你的奴隶战士还给你。这个人在我为你疗伤的时候闯了进来，自称是你的保镖。”
languages.original_text: "As a sign of my favour, I'll give you your slave fighter. They wandered into the den while I was healing you, and said they were your bodyguard."

traits.locale_text: “作为我的青睐，我会把你的奴隶战士还给你。这个人在我为你疗伤的时候闯了进来，自称是你的保镖。”
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: «Como muestra de mi favor, te devuelvo a tu sirviente de combate. Entró en la guarida mientras estaba tratándote y afirmó que era tu guardaespaldas».
languages.original_text: "As a sign of my favour, I'll give you your slave fighter. They wandered into the den while I was healing you, and said they were your bodyguard."

traits.locale_text: «Como muestra de mi favor, te devuelvo a tu sirviente de combate. Entró en la guarida mientras estaba tratándote y afirmó que era tu guardaespaldas».
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: 「せめてもの情けとして、奴隷戦士に同行させよう。貴様を手当てしている間に我々の住処に迷い込んできて、貴様の用心棒だと言っていた」
languages.original_text: "As a sign of my favour, I'll give you your slave fighter. They wandered into the den while I was healing you, and said they were your bodyguard."

traits.locale_text: 「せめてもの情けとして、奴隷戦士に同行させよう。貴様を手当てしている間に我々の住処に迷い込んできて、貴様の用心棒だと言っていた」
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: "Als Zeichen meiner Gunst gebe ich Euch Euren Sklavenkämpfer. Er ist in mein Versteck gekommen, während ich Euch geheilt habe, und hat sich als Eure Leibwache vorgestellt."
languages.original_text: "As a sign of my favour, I'll give you your slave fighter. They wandered into the den while I was healing you, and said they were your bodyguard."

traits.locale_text: "Als Zeichen meiner Gunst gebe ich Euch Euren Sklavenkämpfer. Er ist in mein Versteck gekommen, während ich Euch geheilt habe, und hat sich als Eure Leibwache vorgestellt."
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: « En gage de ma faveur, je vous ferai don d'un combattant esclave. Cette personne s'est aventurée dans l'antre pendant que je vous soignais, en affirmant être votre garde du corps. »
languages.original_text: "As a sign of my favour, I'll give you your slave fighter. They wandered into the den while I was healing you, and said they were your bodyguard."

traits.locale_text: « En gage de ma faveur, je vous ferai don d'un combattant esclave. Cette personne s'est aventurée dans l'antre pendant que je vous soignais, en affirmant être votre garde du corps. »
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: "İyi niyetimi göstermek için dövüşçü köleni yanına vereceğim. Yaralarınla ilgilendiğimiz sırada buraya dalıp muhafızın olduğunu söyledi."
languages.original_text: "As a sign of my favour, I'll give you your slave fighter. They wandered into the den while I was healing you, and said they were your bodyguard."

traits.locale_text: "İyi niyetimi göstermek için savaşçı köleni yanına vereceğim. Yaralarınla ilgileniyorduk ki mekâna dalıp muhafızın olduğunu söyledi."
traits.speaker: Anger
